content: this legal case with reference number 7432021 involves a dispute over the division of a community inheritance following the death of rm the parties involved are sa sc ff and sf sa has sued sc and sf alleging that sc received indirect donations and wrongfully collected sums from a joint bank account while sf unduly occupied a property sa requests the division of the inherited assets collation of donations and sale of the property the court held a hearing where both parties presented their arguments and evidence the judge ruled in favor of sa but the losing party filed an appeal which was reviewed by a higher court and upheld the original decision the losing party then filed a motion for reconsideration which was denied the court has ordered the dissolution of the inheritance community and assigned specific properties to the parties involved sa sf and sc have been assigned properties and must make certain payments to each other sc has the right to receive a certain amount from their brothers the court also ordered sc to pay af and sf to pay ac certain amounts sfs claim for payment for improvements made to a property held under a gratuitous loan was dismissed the court declared the plaintiffs claim for damages inadmissible the courts final ruling was made on april 2 2021 and filed in the clerks office on april 8 2021
